yoast_head:
<!-- This site is optimized with the Yoast SEO plugin v25.2 - https://yoast.com/wordpress/plugins/seo/ -->
<title>Devils & Dust | Bruce Springsteen</title>
<meta name="description" content="This acoustic, primarily solo outing, mixing themes familial and political, followed the extensive tour for The Rising." />
<meta name="robots" content="index, follow, max-snippet:-1, max-image-preview:large, max-video-preview:-1" />
<link rel="canonical" href="https://brucespringsteen.net/albums/devils-dust/" />
<meta property="og:locale" content="en_US" />
<meta property="og:type" content="article" />
<meta property="og:title" content="Devils & Dust" />
<meta property="og:description" content="This acoustic, primarily solo outing, mixing themes familial and political, followed the extensive tour for The Rising. Many of the songs came from Bruce’s archives: “All The Way Home” was written for Southside Johnny in 1991; “Long Time Coming” and “The Hitter” date back to the Tom Joad era. The lyrically controversial “Reno” caused a minor furor." />
<meta property="og:url" content="https://brucespringsteen.net/albums/devils-dust/" />
<meta property="og:site_name" content="Bruce Springsteen" />
<meta property="article:publisher" content="https://www.facebook.com/brucespringsteen" />
<meta property="article:modified_time" content="2023-05-04T17:37:34+00:00" />
<meta property="og:image" content="https://cdn-p.smehost.net/sites/e8622626f9584d40b1a8fce8dfa6f567/wp-content/uploads/2005/04/og-springsteen-devils-dust-front.jpg" />
	<meta property="og:image:width" content="1200" />
	<meta property="og:image:height" content="630" />
	<meta property="og:image:type" content="image/jpeg" />
<meta name="twitter:card" content="summary_large_image" />
<meta name="twitter:title" content="Devils & Dust" />
<meta name="twitter:description" content="This acoustic, primarily solo outing, mixing themes familial and political, followed the extensive tour for The Rising. Many of the songs came from Bruce’s archives: “All The Way Home” was written for Southside Johnny in 1991; “Long Time Coming” and “The Hitter” date back to the Tom Joad era. The lyrically controversial “Reno” caused a minor furor." />
<meta name="twitter:image" content="https://cdn-p.smehost.net/sites/e8622626f9584d40b1a8fce8dfa6f567/wp-content/uploads/2005/04/og-springsteen-devils-dust-front.jpg" />
<meta name="twitter:site" content="@springsteen" />

yoast_head_json.title: Devils & Dust | Bruce Springsteen
yoast_head_json.description: This acoustic, primarily solo outing, mixing themes familial and political, followed the extensive tour for The Rising.
yoast_head_json.og_description: This acoustic, primarily solo outing, mixing themes familial and political, followed the extensive tour for The Rising. Many of the songs came from Bruce’s archives: “All The Way Home” was written for Southside Johnny in 1991; “Long Time Coming” and “The Hitter” date back to the Tom Joad era. The lyrically controversial “Reno” caused a minor furor.
yoast_head_json.twitter_description: This acoustic, primarily solo outing, mixing themes familial and political, followed the extensive tour for The Rising. Many of the songs came from Bruce’s archives: “All The Way Home” was written for Southside Johnny in 1991; “Long Time Coming” and “The Hitter” date back to the Tom Joad era. The lyrically controversial “Reno” caused a minor furor.
